title: The Vegetable Lamb
description: We like to think that science evolves in a way that is...rational. But this isn't always the case. This week, we look at how information and misinformation spread in science.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
content:encoded: We like to think that science evolves in a way that is...rational. But this isn't always the case. This week, we look at how information and misinformation spread in science.
